impositionOffenceDetails.details:
FCOST - Costs
To pay costs of £100.00 to Hogwarts, FO - Fine
Fined £500.00, FVS - Surcharge
To pay a surcharge of £100.00, ACON - Account Consolidated
Account to be consolidated with existing accounts. 
COLLO - Collection order
Collection order made. Make payments as ordered.
PDATE - Pay by date
Pay by date. Date to pay in full by: 06/12/2025.
impositionOffenceDetails.title: Aggravated vehicle taking - ( being carried on ) and property damage of £5000 or over
